<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adds fields related to document templates to the list of fields in 'sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields' which will not be copied in an HR Case transfer.</description>
        <name>Add document transfer case ignore fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var grProperty = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
	if (!grProperty.get('name', 'sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields')) {
		gs.info('[Fix Script]: Did not find sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields to update');
		return;
	}
	
	var existingFields = grProperty.value.toString().split(',');
	var updatedFields = existingFields.concat(['document_template_category', 'document_template', 'auto_initiate_doc_tasks', 'doc_tasks_initiated', 'generated_document', 'html_template_body_override']);
	
	gs.info('[Fix Script]: Updating sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields with fields from com.snc.document_templates');
	gs.setProperty("sn_hr_core.transfer_case.ignored_fields", updatedFields.toString());
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
